posts.title: Welcome to My Digital Collage Journey
posts.excerpt: An introduction to my art, process, and what inspires me to create surreal digital collages.
posts.content:
Welcome to my corner of the internet where digital collage meets emotion, music, and surrealism. I'm Jolene, and I've been creating digital collages for over 20 years.

My work is deeply influenced by musicâ€”particularly the emotional landscapes that songs create. When musicians reach out for album art, we're not just creating a cover; we're translating sound into visual emotion.

Each piece starts with listening. I immerse myself in the track or album, letting the mood, lyrics, and instrumentation guide the imagery. From there, it's about finding the perfect vintage photographs, textures, and elements that capture that feeling.

This blog will be a space where I share my creative process, thoughts on art and music, behind-the-scenes looks at commissions, and tutorials for fellow digital artists. Stay tuned for more!
posts.author: Jolene Casko

image.alt: Lunar Dreams collage with vintage portrait and moons

seo.metaTitle: Welcome to My Digital Collage Journey - Jolene Casko
